Class MyStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • MyStats

  • public class MyStats
extends java.lang.Object
    MyStats is used to record and retrieve statistics about a Pac-Man or Ghost.
    Since:
    2013-04-13

    • Method Summary

        Parameters:

      • scoreAtePacman

        public void scoreAtePacman()
        Ghosts should call this method when they eat Pac-Man

      • addSuper

        public void addSuper()
        Pac-Man should call this method when they eat a PowerPellet. This will give them their super power for a limited amount of time and allow them to eat Ghosts.

      • isSuperTime

        public boolean isSuperTime()
        Returns if you're currently super powered.
        Returns:
        true if you are super, otherwise false

      • anySuperTime

        public boolean anySuperTime()
        Returns if anyone is currently super powered.
        Returns:
        true if anyone is super powered, otherwise false

      • moved

        public void moved()
        You should call this method everytime your Pac-Man or Ghost moves to an adjacent position in the grid during their act method.

      • died

        public void died()
        You should call this method whenever you get eaten.
